data.name: Fivebalance
data.description:
## What Is Fivebalance(FBN)?

FivebalanceUSA uses blockchain technology to fight depression The Fivebalance mobile app focuses on Self Improvement The network runs on a Proof-of-Stake (PoS).

FBN is the native coin that is used for:

* Payments in the mobile app.
* Rewards for achieving your K.P.I goals.
* Staking and Masternode collateral.

The Fivebalance ( FBN ) mobile app is designed to support self improvement. Depression is a common problem for many who struggle with anxiety, which often leads to suicide attempts. This is an area where Fivebalance can possibly make a difference by providing suggestions and guidance on how to improve one's life, providing a mechanism for them to set goals, and giving rewards as motivation and encouragement for accomplishing their set goals.

The Fivebalance mobile app allows users to create data indicators in the categories of fit, financial, family, flair and faith, to support the achievement of financial and self improvement purposes. Using the Key Performance Indicators (KPI) calculation method, users can create, choose, and share their indicators, targets, and achievements as well as KPI scores to inspire each other. Working with similar individuals working on similar issues often results in success for both participants studies have shown.
Everyone can learn from each other and inspire their own personal development by using the Fivebalance mobile application. Recorded goals will play a huge part in preventing depression and attempted suicide caused by individuals who do not understand how or where they need to start, to come out of despair.

## How Many FBN Coins Are There in Circulation?

Fivebalance launched its mainnet on March 22, 2019 after conducting a coin swap for the old FBN erc token. There are 744,380,753 coins in circulation at the time of writing. The project was rebranded on Sep 20th 2020 as FivebalanceUSA and the mobile app, whitepaper, website, and social media accounts were all restructured to focus more on the vision and the charter of self improvement.


### Who Are the Team members of FivebalanceUSA?
James McCoy is the owner and CEO of Fivebalance USA. BunĀaren Eka Suryadi is the Lead developer and Head contractor. He is also the original founder and developer of the Fivebalance mobile app.
The whitepaper can be [found here.](https://github.com/fivebalanceID/whitepaper/blob/master/FBN%20USA%20Whitepaper%203.0.pdf) 

### Where Can I Buy FBN coin (FBN)?

FBN is available for trading on 
[Mercatox Exchange](https://mercatox.com/exchange/FBN/ETH),
[Crex 24 Exchange]( https://crex24.com/id/exchange/FBN-BTC)
and [Hotbit Exchange](https://www.hotbit.io/exchange?symbol=FBN_USDT) 


New to cryptocurrency? Read CoinMarketCap’s [easy guide](https://coinmarketcap.com/how-to-buy-bitcoin/) to buying Bitcoin or any other token.
